name: awesome-toast-component
description: React, Javascript, and Typescript compatible toast.
author: Mostafa Mohammadzadeh

scripts.deploy: npm publish || cd website && npm run build && npm run export && cd .. && find website/out -type d -exec chmod 755 {} \; && find website/out -type f -exec chmod 644 {} \; && git add -A && git commit -m "[deployment auto commit]" && git ftp push
